name: Todd and Jeffrey
description:
Gameplay:

Control 2 mechanics, named Todd and Jeffrey, and interact with all objects before they hit the ground. This requires a lot of multitasking, since one mechanic is too slow to reach all items. An unnecessary interact button press will take away a point from your score.

Controls:

Left mechanic: A and D to move, S to interact

Right mechanic: J and L to move, K to interact

This is a submission for the wowie game jam. I took the topic, everything interacts with everything, or every mechanic interacts with every mechanic, very literally and made every mechanic (the job) interact with everything. Please leave feedback, I want to improve this game.
